# Endpoints

https://auth.felixroske.de/auth/realms/sandbox/.well-known/openid-configuration

Dies funktioniert "Service Accounts enabled"

```bash
curl -k --data "grant_type=client_credentials&client_id=oxygen&client_secret=6f0fc60d-854b-4495-92e1-bc948c43262c" "https://auth.felixroske.de/auth/realms/sandbox/protocol/openid-connect/token"
```

Introspection:

curl -v --data "client_secret=6f0fc60d-854b-4495-92e1-bc948c43262c&client_id=oxygen&token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCIgOiAiSldUIiwia2lkIiA6ICJhS05Tc3g2UGJMQnNzbzhIZndiVnVXWVZpMV9MZW9jWVdULTRuZ2FYQUtRIn0..sM3itFZYeFCiCIkE1eeQNMJz704YwCcRhIc3jG3RsdCbYBmR-QV8h1byRxqu6hUeIYrUe7Ls9ra4cHsqjFyfzyK9CBi8Yi8r_KEv1SaTJcrkpnuJ-R-u6wc2K9scTBfHrKRZA3oUDp1nUDHxtnsYf3MZ2a38vjb3E6W-Qk-dcq8PF1z0PSPJe9NEpojagKes0cwdeY8BxL3uH2rP8xu4RCd8DVshB2Au76oBrplbrdIflsKVPGMC2pn2UwPOOLnATHvaC_pz_vlvFzQdoEDxAhdqxkfoOtcTMPp0jPANa3R-I9cHJzWtsBljDNTS04PRjzx_orSbDw38nfIZXy-QAA" \
http://localhost:8080/auth/realms/springdemo/protocol/openid-connect/token/introspect
